verses.verse: And it came to pass in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month <S%H6218><s%>, the tenth day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, that certain <S%H582><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and sat <S%H3427><s%> before me <S%H6440><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: Is it to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of me that ye are come <S%H935><s%>? As I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, I will not be inquired of by you <S%H1875><s%>.

Wilt thou judge <S%H8199><s%> them <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, wilt thou judge <S%H8199><s%> them <S%H3045><s%>? Cause them to know the abominations <S%H8441><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>;

and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: In the day <S%H3117><s%> when I chose <S%H977><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and sware <S%H3027><s%> unto <S%H5375><s%> the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and made myself known <S%H3045><s%> unto them in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, when I sware <S%H3027><s%> unto <S%H5375><s%> them <S%H559><s%>, saying, I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>;

in that day <S%H3117><s%> I sware <S%H3027><s%> unto <S%H5375><s%> them <S%H3318><s%>, to bring them forth out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> into a land <S%H776><s%> that I had searched <S%H8446><s%> out for them <S%H2100><s%>, flowing with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>, which is the glory <S%H6643><s%> of all lands <S%H776><s%>.

And I said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7993><s%>, Cast ye away every man <S%H376><s%> the abominations <S%H8251><s%> of his eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and defile <S%H2930><s%> not yourselves with the idols <S%H1544><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

But they rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against me <S%H14><s%>, and would not hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H376><s%>; they did not every man cast away <S%H7993><s%> the abominations <S%H8251><s%> of their eyes <S%H5869><s%>, neither did they forsake <S%H5800><s%> the idols <S%H1544><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>. Then I said <S%H559><s%> I would pour out <S%H8210><s%> my wrath <S%H2534><s%> upon them <S%H3615><s%>, to accomplish my anger <S%H639><s%> against them in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

But I wrought <S%H6213><s%> for my name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake <S%H2490><s%>, that it should not be profaned in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, among <S%H8432><s%> which they were <S%H5869><s%>, in whose sight I made myself known <S%H3045><s%> unto them <S%H3318><s%>, in bringing them forth out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.
So I caused them to go forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> them into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

And I gave <S%H5414><s%> them my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and showed <S%H3045><s%> them mine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, which if a man <S%H120><s%> do <S%H6213><s%>, he shall live in them <S%H2425><s%>.

Moreover also I gave <S%H5414><s%> them my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, to be a sign <S%H226><s%> between me and them <S%H3045><s%>, that they might know that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> that sanctifieth them <S%H6942><s%>.

But the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against me in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: they walked <S%H1980><s%> not in my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and they rejected <S%H3988><s%> mine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, which if a man <S%H120><s%> keep <S%H6213><s%>, he shall live <S%H2425><s%> in them <S%H7676><s%>; and my sabbaths they greatly <S%H3966><s%> profaned <S%H2490><s%>. Then I said <S%H559><s%> I would pour out <S%H8210><s%> my wrath <S%H2534><s%> upon them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, to consume them <S%H3615><s%>.

But I wrought <S%H6213><s%> for my name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake <S%H2490><s%>, that it should not be profaned in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, in whose sight <S%H5869><s%> I brought them out <S%H3318><s%>.

Moreover also I sware <S%H3027><s%> unto <S%H5375><s%> them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, that I would not bring <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> which I had given <S%H5414><s%> them <S%H2100><s%>, flowing with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>, which is the glory <S%H6643><s%> of all lands <S%H776><s%>;

because they rejected <S%H3988><s%> mine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, and walked <S%H1980><s%> not in my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and profaned <S%H2490><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>: for their heart <S%H3820><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their idols <S%H1544><s%>.

Nevertheless mine eye <S%H5869><s%> spared <S%H2347><s%> them <S%H7843><s%>, and I destroyed them not <S%H6213><s%>, neither did I make a full end <S%H3617><s%> of them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

And I said <S%H559><s%> unto their children <S%H1121><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, Walk <S%H3212><s%> ye not in the statutes <S%H2706><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%>, neither observe <S%H8104><s%> their ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, nor defile <S%H2930><s%> yourselves with their idols <S%H1544><s%>.
I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>: walk <S%H3212><s%> in my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> mine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, and do them <S%H6213><s%>;
and hallow <S%H6942><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>; and they shall be a sign <S%H226><s%> between me and you <S%H3045><s%>, that ye may know that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

But the children <S%H1121><s%> rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against me <S%H1980><s%>; they walked not in my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, neither kept <S%H8104><s%> mine ordinances <S%H4941><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H120><s%>, which if a man do <S%H6213><s%>, he shall live <S%H2425><s%> in them <S%H2490><s%>; they profaned my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>. Then I said <S%H559><s%> I would pour out <S%H8210><s%> my wrath <S%H2534><s%> upon them <S%H3615><s%>, to accomplish my anger <S%H639><s%> against them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

Nevertheless I withdrew <S%H7725><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%>, and wrought <S%H6213><s%> for my name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake <S%H2490><s%>, that it should not be profaned in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, in whose sight <S%H5869><s%> I brought them forth <S%H3318><s%>.

Moreover I sware <S%H3027><s%> unto <S%H5375><s%> them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, that I would scatter <S%H6327><s%> them among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and disperse <S%H2219><s%> them through the countries <S%H776><s%>;

because they had not executed <S%H6213><s%> mine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, but had rejected <S%H3988><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and had profaned <S%H2490><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, and their eyes <S%H5869><s%> were after <S%H310><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%>' idols <S%H1544><s%>.
Moreover also I gave <S%H5414><s%> them statutes <S%H2706><s%> that were not good <S%H2896><s%>, and ordinances <S%H4941><s%> wherein they should not live <S%H2421><s%>;

and I polluted <S%H2930><s%> them in their own gifts <S%H4979><s%>, in that they caused to pass through <S%H5674><s%> the fire all that openeth <S%H6363><s%> the womb <S%H7356><s%>, that I might make them desolate <S%H8074><s%>, to the end that they might know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Therefore <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: In this moreover have your fathers <S%H1><s%> blasphemed <S%H1442><s%> me <S%H4603><s%>, in that they have committed a trespass against me <S%H4604><s%>.

For when I had brought <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%>, which I sware <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H5375><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> unto them <S%H7200><s%>, then they saw every high <S%H7311><s%> hill <S%H1389><s%>, and every thick <S%H5687><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>, and they offered <S%H2076><s%> there their sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>, and there they presented <S%H5414><s%> the provocation <S%H3708><s%> of their offering <S%H2076><s%>; there also they made <S%H7760><s%> their sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%>, and they poured out <S%H5258><s%> there their drink-offerings <S%H5262><s%>.

Then I said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H1116><s%>, What meaneth the high place whereunto ye go <S%H935><s%>? So the name <S%H8034><s%> thereof is called <S%H7121><s%> Bamah <S%H1117><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

Wherefore say <S%H559><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: Do ye pollute <S%H2930><s%> yourselves after the manner <S%H1870><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%>? and play ye the harlot <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their abominations <S%H8251><s%>?

and when ye offer <S%H5375><s%> your gifts <S%H4979><s%>, when ye make your sons <S%H1121><s%> to pass through <S%H5674><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%>, do ye pollute <S%H2930><s%> yourselves with all your idols <S%H1544><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>? and shall I be inquired <S%H1875><s%> of by you <S%H1004><s%>, O house of Israel <S%H3478><s%>? As I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, I will not be inquired of by you <S%H1875><s%>;

and that which cometh <S%H5927><s%> into your mind <S%H7307><s%> shall not be at all <S%H559><s%>, in that ye say, We will be <S%H1961><s%> as the nations <S%H1471><s%>, as the families <S%H4940><s%> of the countries <S%H776><s%>, to serve <S%H8334><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone <S%H68><s%>.

As I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, surely with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and with an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>, and with wrath <S%H2534><s%> poured out <S%H5186><s%>, will I be king over you <S%H4427><s%>:

and I will bring you out <S%H3318><s%> from the peoples <S%H5971><s%>, and will gather <S%H6908><s%> you out of the countries <S%H776><s%> wherein ye are scattered <S%H6327><s%>, with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and with an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>, and with wrath <S%H2534><s%> poured out <S%H5186><s%>;
and I will bring <S%H935><s%> you into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%>, and there will I enter into judgment <S%H8199><s%> with you face <S%H6440><s%> to face <S%H6440><s%>.

Like as I entered into judgment <S%H8199><s%> with your fathers <S%H1><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, so will I enter into judgment <S%H8199><s%> with you <S%H5002><s%>, saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.
And I will cause you to pass <S%H5674><s%> under the rod <S%H7626><s%>, and I will bring <S%H935><s%> you into the bond <S%H4562><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>;

and I will purge out <S%H1305><s%> from among you the rebels <S%H4775><s%>, and them that transgress <S%H6586><s%> against me <S%H3318><s%>; I will bring them forth out of the land <S%H776><s%> where they sojourn <S%H4033><s%>, but they shall not enter <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

As for you <S%H1004><s%>, O house of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Go <S%H3212><s%> ye <S%H5647><s%>, serve every one <S%H376><s%> his idols <S%H1544><s%>, and hereafter <S%H310><s%> also <S%H8085><s%>, if ye will not hearken unto me <S%H6944><s%>; but my holy name <S%H8034><s%> shall ye no more profane <S%H2490><s%> with your gifts <S%H4979><s%>, and with your idols <S%H1544><s%>.

For in my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>, in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the height <S%H4791><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, there shall all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, all of them <S%H5647><s%>, serve me in the land <S%H776><s%>: there will I accept <S%H7521><s%> them <S%H1875><s%>, and there will I require your offerings <S%H8641><s%>, and the first-fruits <S%H7225><s%> of your oblations <S%H4864><s%>, with all your holy things <S%H6944><s%>.

As a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> will I accept <S%H7521><s%> you <S%H3318><s%>, when I bring you out from the peoples <S%H5971><s%>, and gather <S%H6908><s%> you out <S%H3318><s%> of the countries <S%H776><s%> wherein ye have been scattered <S%H6327><s%>; and I will be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in you in the sight of the nations <S%H1471><s%>.

And ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, when I shall bring <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, into the country <S%H776><s%> which I sware <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H5375><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And there shall ye remember <S%H2142><s%> your ways <S%H1870><s%>, and all your doings <S%H5949><s%>, wherein ye have polluted <S%H2930><s%> yourselves <S%H6962><s%>; and ye shall loathe yourselves in your own sight <S%H6440><s%> for all your evils <S%H7451><s%> that ye have committed <S%H6213><s%>.

And ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, when I have dealt <S%H6213><s%> with you for my name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake <S%H7451><s%>, not according to your evil ways <S%H1870><s%>, nor according to your corrupt <S%H7843><s%> doings <S%H5949><s%>, O ye house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, set <S%H7760><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the south <S%H8486><s%>, and drop <S%H5197><s%> thy word toward the south <S%H1864><s%>, and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against the forest <S%H3293><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> in the South <S%H5045><s%>;

and say <S%H559><s%> to the forest <S%H3293><s%> of the South <S%H5045><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Behold <S%H3341><s%>, I will kindle a fire <S%H784><s%> in thee <S%H398><s%>, and it shall devour every green <S%H3892><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> in thee <S%H3002><s%>, and every dry tree <S%H6086><s%>: the flaming <S%H3852><s%> flame <S%H7957><s%> shall not be quenched <S%H3518><s%>, and all faces <S%H6440><s%> from the south <S%H5045><s%> to the north <S%H6828><s%> shall be burnt thereby <S%H6866><s%>.
And all flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> that I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, have kindled <S%H1197><s%> it <S%H3518><s%>; it shall not be quenched.
Then said <S%H559><s%> I <S%H162><s%>, Ah Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>! they say <S%H559><s%> of me <S%H4911><s%>, Is he not a speaker of parables <S%H4912><s%>?
